lead_paragraph: Germany's top football league will not be allowed to sell exclusive rights for live television broadcasts after the country's competition watchdog insisted on a "no single buyer" rule for the imminent Bundesliga rights auction, three sources with knowledge of the matter told Reuters.

headline.print_headline: German Watchdog Presses for Bundesliga Broadcasting Rights to Be Split
headline.main: German Watchdog Presses for Bundesliga Broadcasting Rights to Be Split
